column5: Hey all. I want to paint up some jig's this winter and I was wondering if anyone here has used this product before.  Where can I get it locally too?  Thanks.
I have used it and like it, if done right it is a lot more durable than regular paint. No idea where to get it in your area though.
I use it. You can order it from luremaking.com, Geoff.
Any idea what they charge for shipping Roy?  *edit* the shipping cost more then the product, HAHAHA
The following is a neat site. http://www.csipaint.com/products/powder-coatings/pro-tec-powder-paint.asp  Point to the colour and a jig with that colour appears on the screen.  Regards, Snowball
Gagnons in Oshawa carries pro-tec powder paint.
Ya sure?  Randy emailed me today saying he cannot get it.  I'm just going to get off of luremaking.com (if they ever get back to me)...  But thanks all.
